casebody.head_matter:
623 A.2d 815
CITY OF WILKES-BARRE, Appellant, v. WILKES-BARRE FIREFIGHTERS ASSOCIATION, Local 104, International Association of Firefighters, AFL-CIO.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 5, 1993.
Decided April 30, 1993.
